Package com.adminportal.service

Interface ArticleExternalService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArticleExternalServiceImpl
    public interface ArticleExternalService
    This interface has all the method declaration related to Article Resource's database operation
    Author:
    om prakash

                      java.lang.String url,
                      java.sql.Timestamp date,
                      int id)
        update Article attributes like description, source, url and modified date given Article ID
        Parameters:
        desc - A long description to be set
        source - A reference related to Article
        url - A proper url
        date - Current date
        id - Article ID
        Returns:
        boolean value on success or failure
